trans-unit.source: Serves as the root class of the Chart control.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som roten klasse diagramkontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This class exposes all of the properties, methods and events of the Chart Windows control.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen viser alle egenskaper, metoder og hendelser i diagrammet Windows-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Two important properties of the Chart class are the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A> properties, both of which are collection properties.
trans-unit.target: To viktige egenskaper for klassen diagrammet er den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A>Egenskaper begge er Egenskaper for samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A> collection property stores <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects, which are used to store data that is to be displayed, along with attributes of that data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A>samlingen egenskapen butikker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>objekter, som brukes til å lagre data som skal vises, sammen med attributter for dataene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A> collection property stores <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> objects, which are primarily used to draw one or more charts using one set of axes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A>samlingen egenskapen butikker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objekter, som brukes til å tegne én eller flere diagrammer med ett sett med akser primært.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: You can use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> class at run time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne konstruktøren til å opprette en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>klassen på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: However, for simplicity, it is recommended that you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> instance at design time.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid for enkelt, anbefales det at du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>forekomsten under utformingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This is the root object of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette er rotobjekt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: Aligns data points along the X axis using their axis labels.
trans-unit.target: Justerer datapunkt langs X-aksen ved hjelp av deres akseetiketter.

trans-unit.source: Applicable when multiple series are indexed and their X-values are strings.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder når flere serier indekseres og X-verdiene er strenger.

trans-unit.source: Aligns data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels.
trans-unit.target: Justerer datapunkter fra ulike langs X-aksen ved hjelp av deres akseetiketter.

trans-unit.source: The specified series in the chart are aligned using an ascending sort order.
trans-unit.target: De angitte seriene i diagrammet er justert ved hjelp av en stigende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to align data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels, and is applicable when: - Multiple series are displayed and are indexed; that is, all data points have an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A> of 0, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.IsXValueIndexed%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å justere datapunkter fra ulike langs X-aksen ved hjelp av deres akseetiketter og gjelder når:-flere serier vises og indeksert; Det vil si alle datapunkt har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A>0, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.IsXValueIndexed%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.IsXValueIndexed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: - All data points have non-empty axis labels, which are unique to their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>.
trans-unit.target: -Alle datapunkt har ikke-tomme akseetiketter, som er unike for sine <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>

trans-unit.source: If they are not unique, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis de ikke er unik, vil bli utløst et unntak.

trans-unit.source: This situation is very common when data-binding results in the creation of multiple series, and `string` values are used for X-axis values.
trans-unit.target: Dette er svært vanlig når databinding fører til opprettelse av flere serier og `string` verdier som skal brukes for x-akseverdier.

trans-unit.source: Two issues arise when multiple, indexed series are plotted, and the X-values are set using `string` values: - It cannot be guaranteed that data points from different series with the same string X-values will be plotted at the same index along the X axis.
trans-unit.target: To problemer som oppstår når flere indeksert serien tegnes, og X-verdier er angitt med `string` verdier:-kan ikke garanteres at tegnes datapunkter fra ulike med samme strengen X-verdiene i den samme indeksen langs X-aksen.

trans-unit.source: - Only the axis label for the data points in the first series will be displayed, even though data points from other series with the same index have axis labels too.
trans-unit.target: -Bare akseetikett for datapunkt i den første serien vises, selv om datapunkter fra andre serier med den samme indeksen har akseetiketter for.

trans-unit.source: By default, points are plotted in the order in which they are stored in their series.
trans-unit.target: Punkt tegnes som standard i rekkefølgen som de er lagret i sine serie.

trans-unit.source: To specify a sort order, use an `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` method overload that has a `sortingOrder` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en sorteringsrekkefølge, kan du bruke en `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` overlasten for metoden som har en `sortingOrder` parameter.

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of series that will have their data points aligned to the X axis using the data point axis labels.
trans-unit.target: En kommadelt liste over serien som har datapunktene justeres til X-aksen med aksen for datapunktetiketter.

trans-unit.source: Aligns data points using their axis labels.
trans-unit.target: Justerer datapunkter med etikettene aksen.

trans-unit.source: All series in the chart are aligned, using the specified sort order.
trans-unit.target: Alle serie i diagrammet er justert, ved hjelp av den angitte sorteringsrekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"></xref> object that indicates if ascending or descending sort order is used on axis labels, which in turn determines the order by which points that previously occupied the same axis space are displayed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"> </xref> objekt som angir om stigende eller synkende rekkefølge brukes på akseetiketter, som i sin tur bestemmer rekkefølgen som vises i punkt tidligere på samme akse område.

trans-unit.source: Aligns data points using their axis labels.
trans-unit.target: Justerer datapunkter med etikettene aksen.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to align data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels, and is applicable when: - Multiple series are displayed and are indexed; that is, all data points have an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A> of 0, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.IsXValueIndexed%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å justere datapunkter fra ulike langs X-aksen ved hjelp av deres akseetiketter og gjelder når:-flere serier vises og indeksert; Det vil si alle datapunkt har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A>0, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.IsXValueIndexed%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.IsXValueIndexed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: - All data points have non-empty axis labels, which are unique to their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>.
trans-unit.target: -Alle datapunkt har ikke-tomme akseetiketter, som er unike for sine <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>

trans-unit.source: If they are not unique, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis de ikke er unik, vil bli utløst et unntak.

trans-unit.source: This situation is very common when data-binding results in the creation of multiple series, and `string` values are used for X-axis values.
trans-unit.target: Dette er svært vanlig når databinding fører til opprettelse av flere serier og `string` verdier som skal brukes for x-akseverdier.

trans-unit.source: Two issues arise when multiple, indexed series are plotted, and the X-values are set using `string` values: - It cannot be guaranteed that data points from different series with the same string X-values will be plotted at the same index along the X axis.
trans-unit.target: To problemer som oppstår når flere indeksert serien tegnes, og X-verdier er angitt med `string` verdier:-kan ikke garanteres at tegnes datapunkter fra ulike med samme strengen X-verdiene i den samme indeksen langs X-aksen.

trans-unit.source: - Only the axis label for the data points in the first series will be displayed, even though data points from other series with the same index have axis labels too.
trans-unit.target: -Bare akseetikett for datapunkt i den første serien vises, selv om datapunkter fra andre serier med den samme indeksen har akseetiketter for.

trans-unit.source: By default, points are plotted in the order in which they are stored in their series.
trans-unit.target: Punkt tegnes som standard i rekkefølgen som de er lagret i sine serie.

trans-unit.source: To specify a sort order, use an `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` method overload that has a `sortingOrder` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en sorteringsrekkefølge, kan du bruke en `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` overlasten for metoden som har en `sortingOrder` parameter.

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of series that should be aligned by axis label.
trans-unit.target: En kommadelt liste over serien skal justeres etter akseetikett.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"></xref> enumeration value that determines if ascending or descending sort order is used on axis labels, which in turn determines the order by which points that previously occupied the same axis space are displayed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som bestemmer om stigende eller synkende rekkefølge brukes på akseetiketter, som i sin tur bestemmer rekkefølgen som vises i punkt tidligere på samme akse område.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the end-user places an annotation on the chart.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når sluttbrukeren plasserer merknaden i diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the annotation position is changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når posisjonen for merknaden er endret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the annotation position is about to change.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når posisjon for merknad skal til å endre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection that stores the chart annotations.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en samling som lagrer merknader for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: All of the chart annotations are stored in this collection property.
trans-unit.target: Alle merknader for diagrammet er lagret i denne samlingen-egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection"></xref> object that is used to store chart annotations.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection"> </xref> objekt som brukes til å lagre diagrammet kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a selection of the annotation is changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rekke merknaden er endret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the annotation text is changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når merknadsteksten er endret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether anti-aliasing is used when text and graphics are drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om utjevning brukes ved tekst og grafikk tegnes.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing smoothens out "jagged edges" by padding pixels with intermediate colors, and is especially effective for smoothing out edges for charts that are not drawn as rectangles.
trans-unit.target: Anti-aliasing smoothens ut "ujevne kanter" ved å fylle piksler med mellomliggende farger, og er spesielt effektivt jevne ut kantene for diagrammer som ikke er tegnet som rektangler.

trans-unit.source: For example, anti-aliasing is very effective for line charts and pie charts, but is not as effective for bar and column charts.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel anti-aliasing er svært effektiv for linjediagram og sektor diagrammer, men virker ikke som for coolbar- og stående stolpediagram.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing can be applied to text and/or graphics primitives such as rectangles, circles, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Anti-aliasing kan brukes til tekst og/eller grafikk primitivene som rektangler, sirkler og så videre.

trans-unit.source: Note that anti-aliasing will affect performance.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at utjevning innvirkning på ytelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AntiAliasingStyles"></xref> enumeration value that determines whether anti-aliasing is used when text and graphics are drawn.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AntiAliasingStyles"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som bestemmer om utjevning brukes ved tekst og grafikk tegnes.

trans-unit.source: Sets the automatically assigned series and data point colors, to allow programmatic access at run time.
trans-unit.target: Angis automatisk tilordnet serie og punkt fargene, programmatisk adgang på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> colors are automatically assigned at run time, there is no way to know what the colors will be prior to the time when the chart rendered; the `Color` property of an automatically assigned value will return <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> at this time.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>farger tilordnes automatisk ved kjøretid, er det ikke mulig å finne hva fargene blir før tiden når diagrammet gjengis; den `Color` -egenskapen til en verdi som er automatisk tilordnet tilbakestiller <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>på dette tidspunktet.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: If you call the ApplyPaletteColors method, the colors for the series and the data points will be set, which allows for programmatic access.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller metoden ApplyPaletteColors, settes farger for serien og datapunktene som gjør det mulig for programmatisk tilgang.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the axis scroll bar is clicked by the end-user.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når rullefeltet for aksen klikkes av sluttbrukeren.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the axis scale view position or size is changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når aksen skalaen visningen plasseringen eller størrelsen er endret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the axis scale view position or size is about to change.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når aksen skalaen visningen plasseringen eller størrelsen er ferd med å endre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi denne egenskapen til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: Note that for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, the alpha component cannot be set to a value other than 255.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objektet, alfa komponenten ikke kan settes til en annen verdi enn 255.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This also means that, for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object only, a <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A> value cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at, også for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objekt, et <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>verdien kan ikke brukes.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: The BackColor value will be the first color used if you are using gradient colors for the background.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for bakgrunnsfarge blir første fargen som brukes hvis du bruker gradering farger for bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: The alpha value controls the opacity of a color.
trans-unit.target: Alfaverdi kontrollerer tettheten for en farge.

trans-unit.source: If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the title.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne fargen til "gjennomsiktig" – det vil si hvis du bruker en alfaverdi 0 – ingen farge som skal tilordnes til bakgrunn for tittelen.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the background will be transparent.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnen vil resultatet være gjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the background color of the chart.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne bakgrunnsfargen for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: The default color is [System.Drawing.Color.White](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Standardfargen er [System.Drawing.Color.White](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir retningen for bakgrunnsgraderingen for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Also determines whether a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om gradering brukes også.

trans-unit.source: Use the BackGradientStyle property to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used.
trans-unit.target: Bruk BackGradientStyle-egenskapen til å fastslå om en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontrollen viser gradering, og til å bestemme retningen på graderingen Hvis én brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available patterns, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over tilgjengelige mønstre, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors: Set the primary color of the chart background with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruke gradering farger: Angi primær fargen på bakgrunnen diagrammet med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the secondary color of the chart background with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angir den sekundære fargen for diagrammet bakgrunnen med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackSecondaryColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this BackGradientStyle property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen BackGradientStyle ønsket gradering stil.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration that specifies the orientation for the background gradient of a chart and whether a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref> opplisting som angir retning for bakgrunnsgraderingen et diagram og om gradering brukes.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The BackgroundImage property is not used.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BackgroundImage brukes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImage*> property instead.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImage*>egenskapen i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImage*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skravering stilen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>Opplisting angir skravering mønsteret som brukes av en velgeren av typen <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
trans-unit.target: Skravering mønsteret består av en fylt bakgrunnsfarge og linjer tegnes over bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over tilgjengelige skravering maler, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: **Note** The color of hatching lines is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** fargen på skravering linjer fastsettes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackSecondaryColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration that specifies the hatching style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref> opplisting som angir skravering den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsbildet for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property defines a path to a background image for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en bane til et bakgrunnsbilde for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>forklaring, og kan være en absolutt eller relativ URL-adresse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: To position the image, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For å plassere bildet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi ett av fargene som bildet som "gjennomsiktig", ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons.
trans-unit.target: Et bilde kan er hentet fra alle gyldige filtyper som støttes av .NET Framework, inkludert ikonene.

trans-unit.source: Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunn overstyrer andre egenskaper for bakgrunn for eksempel graderingsfargen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an image file.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer URL-adressen til en bildefil.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image alignment used for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> drawing mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for bakgrunnsbilde brukes det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref> tegnemodus.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the alignment of the background image for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control; it is only applied when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer denne egenskapen justering for bakgrunnsbilde for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll; den brukes bare når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the background image alignment of the chart.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir justeringen for bakgrunnsbilde for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control that will be displayed as transparent.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen som skal vises som gjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be displayed as transparent when the chart image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som skal vises som gjennomsiktig når diagrambildet tegnes.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tegnemodus for bakgrunnsbilde for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property determines how the image is displayed, for example, tiled, scaled, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen bestemmer hvordan bildet skal vises, for eksempel side ved side, skalert og så videre.

trans-unit.source: If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the chart.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et bilde skaleres, skal den strekkes for å passe i grensene for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the chart.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bildet side ved side, tegnes den gjentatte ganger fra øvre venstre hjørnet for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om de tilgjengelige wrapping modiene den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>opplisting emnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: If the BackImageWrapMode property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>, the location where the image is drawn is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen BackImageWrapMode er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>, bestemmes plasseringen der tegnes bildet av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A>egenskapsinnstillingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the drawing mode for the background image of the chart.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir tegnemodus for bakgrunnsbilde for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color of the chart background.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den sekundære fargen for bakgrunnsbilde for diagram.

trans-unit.source: The BackSecondaryColor property determines the secondary background color of many <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BackSecondaryColor angir den sekundære bakgrunnsfargen for mange <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objekter, og brukes når gradering farger brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: You can set BackSecondaryColor to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan konfigurere BackSecondaryColor til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: If hatching is used, the BackSecondaryColor property determines the color of the hatching lines for the chart.
trans-unit.target: Hvis skravering brukes, angir egenskapen BackSecondaryColor fargen på linjene skravering for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors for the background of a chart: - Set the primary color with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruke gradering farger for bakgrunn for et diagram:-Angi primær farge med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the secondary color with the BackSecondaryColor property.
trans-unit.target: -Angi den sekundære fargen med egenskapen BackSecondaryColor.

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackGradientStyle%2A>egenskapen ønsket gradering stilen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackGradientStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the secondary color of the chart background.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som representerer den sekundære fargen for bakgrunnsbilde for diagram.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Signals to the object that initialization is starting.
trans-unit.target: Signaler som initialisering starter til objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the chart border.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på kantlinjen for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: To get or set the border color, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderlineColor%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente eller angi kantlinjefargen, kan du bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderlineColor%2A>i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderlineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the chart border.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne diagramkantlinje.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the border.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen på kantlinjen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the style of the border.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir stilen på kantlinjen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the border line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på kantlinjen linje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the border line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> brukes til å tegne kantlinjen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the border line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen på kantlinjen linjen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the style of the border line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir stilen på kantlinjen linjen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the border line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden på kantlinjen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that specifies the width of the border line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir bredden på kantlinjen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin"></xref> object, which provides border skin functionality for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin"> </xref> -objektet som inneholder kantlinje verktøylinje funksjonene for det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify a border skin for the chart.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi en kantlinjeskallet for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin"></xref> object which provides border skin functionality for the chart.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin"> </xref> objektet som inneholder kantlinje verktøylinje funksjonene for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or set s the width of the chart border.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir s bredden på kantlinjen for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: To get or set of the border width, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderlineWidth%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: Hent eller sett med kantlinjebredden, Bruk <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderlineWidth%2A>i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderlineWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that determines the border width, in pixels, of the chart.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som bestemmer kantlinjetykkelsen på diagrammet i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the build number of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter build-nummer av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the build number of the chart control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> som representerer kompilering antall diagramkontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection"></xref> object that is used to store <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Henter en skrivebeskyttet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection"> </xref> objekt som brukes til å lagre <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: This collection property lets you access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection> object, which stores <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> objects and also provides methods and properties used to manipulate the collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen egenskapen gjør at du har tilgang til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection>-objektet som lagrer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objekter og gir deg også metoder og egenskaper som brukes til å redigere samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> objects are used to plot one or more charts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objektene brukes til å tegne ett eller flere diagrammer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: A read-only <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection"></xref> object that contains collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En skrivebeskyttet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection"> </xref> objekt som inneholder samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the custom <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the entire chart.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, returnerer egendefinert <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> for hele diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the chart.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cursor position is changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når markørposisjonen endres.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cursor position is about to change.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når markørposisjonen er i ferd med å endre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before the chart image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer like før diagrambildet tegnes.

trans-unit.source: Use this event to customize the chart picture.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne hendelsen til å tilpasse diagrambildet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the chart legend must be customized.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når diagramforklaringen må tilpasses.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Data binds the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Data bindinger den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen til en datakilde.

trans-unit.source: This method will bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control to the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden vil binde den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontrollen til den angitte datakilden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: In cases where a data source is set to a chart and no other data operations are required, the DataBind method does not have to be explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: I tilfeller der en datakilde er satt til et diagram, og ingen andre dataoperasjoner er nødvendig, har ikke metoden Databinde kalles eksplisitt.

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> itself will data bind to the data source prior to being rendered.
trans-unit.target: I slike tilfeller i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>selve vil data bindes til datakilden før gjengitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: Data binds a chart to the table, with one series created per unique value in a given column.
trans-unit.target: Data binding et diagram i tabellen med én serie opprettet per unike verdier i en gitt kolonne.

trans-unit.source: Series will be automatically added to the chart, depending on the number of unique values in the given `seriesGroupByField` column of the data source; in other words, the creation of series depends upon grouping of a column.
trans-unit.target: Serien automatisk legges til i diagrammet, avhengig av antallet unike verdier i den angitte `seriesGroupByField` kolonnen i datakilden; med andre ord, oppretting av serien, avhenger av gruppering av en kolonne.

trans-unit.source: The data source can be a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> or a <xref:System.Data.DataView> object.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden kan være en <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>eller <xref:System.Data.DataView>objektet.</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: Note that all collections that implement the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface can be used.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at alle samlinger som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>grensesnittet kan brukes.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Other data point properties besides X and Y-values can be bound.
trans-unit.target: Andre egenskaper for datapunkt i tillegg X og Y-verdier kan være bundet.

trans-unit.source: The format is: PointProperty=Field[{Format}] [,PointProperty= Field[{Format}]].
trans-unit.target: Formatet er: PointProperty = feltet [{Format}] [, PointProperty = feltet [{Format}]].

trans-unit.source: For example:"Tooltip=Price{C1},Href=WebSiteName".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel: "verktøytips = pris {C1} Href = NavnPåWebområde".

trans-unit.source: A list of these data point properties is as follows: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.AxisLabel%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.ToolTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Url%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendToolTip%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.CustomProperties%2A>, which are the names of the custom properties.
trans-unit.target: En liste over egenskaper disse dataene er som følger: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.AxisLabel%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.ToolTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Url%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendToolTip%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.CustomProperties%2A>, som er navn på egendefinerte egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.CustomProperties%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Url%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.AxisLabel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source that is data bound by a chart.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden som databundet av et diagram.

trans-unit.source: The name of the field used to group data into the series.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet som ble brukt til å gruppedata i serien.

trans-unit.source: The name of the field for X values.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet for X-verdier.

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of name(s) of the field(s) for Y value(s).
trans-unit.target: En kommadelt liste over navn på felt for y-verdi(er).

trans-unit.source: The other data point properties that can be bound.
trans-unit.target: Andre datapunktet egenskapene som kan bindes.

trans-unit.source: Data binds a chart to the table, with one series created per unique value in a given column.
trans-unit.target: Data binding et diagram i tabellen med én serie opprettet per unike verdier i en gitt kolonne.

trans-unit.source: Series will be automatically added to the chart, depending on the number of unique values in the given `seriesGroupByField` column of the data source; in other words, the creation of series depends upon grouping of a column.
trans-unit.target: Serien automatisk legges til i diagrammet, avhengig av antallet unike verdier i den angitte `seriesGroupByField` kolonnen i datakilden; med andre ord, oppretting av serien, avhenger av gruppering av en kolonne.

trans-unit.source: The data source can be a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> or a <xref:System.Data.DataView> object.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden kan være en <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>eller <xref:System.Data.DataView>objektet.</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: Note that all collections that implement the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface can be used.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at alle samlinger som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>grensesnittet kan brukes.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Other data point properties besides X and Y-values can be bound.
trans-unit.target: Andre egenskaper for datapunkt i tillegg X og Y-verdier kan være bundet.

trans-unit.source: The format is: PointProperty=Field[{Format}] [,PointProperty= Field[{Format}]].
trans-unit.target: Formatet er: PointProperty = feltet [{Format}] [, PointProperty = feltet [{Format}]].

trans-unit.source: For example:"Tooltip=Price{C1},Href=WebSiteName".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel: "verktøytips = pris {C1} Href = NavnPåWebområde".

trans-unit.source: A list of these data point properties is as follows: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.AxisLabel%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.ToolTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Url%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendToolTip%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.CustomProperties%2A>, which are the names of the custom properties.
trans-unit.target: En liste over egenskaper disse dataene er som følger: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.AxisLabel%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.ToolTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Url%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendToolTip%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.CustomProperties%2A>, som er navn på egendefinerte egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.CustomProperties%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Url%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.AxisLabel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source that is data bound by a chart.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden som databundet av et diagram.

trans-unit.source: The name of the field used to group data into the series.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet som ble brukt til å gruppedata i serien.

trans-unit.source: The name of the field for X values.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet for X-verdier.

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of name(s) of the field(s) for Y value(s).
trans-unit.target: En kommadelt liste over navn på felt for y-verdi(er).

trans-unit.source: The other data point properties that can be bound.
trans-unit.target: Andre datapunktet egenskapene som kan bindes.

trans-unit.source: The order in which the series will be sorted by group field values.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen serien skal sorteres etter feltverdier for gruppen.

trans-unit.source: Automatically creates and binds series data to the specified data table.
trans-unit.target: Automatisk oppretter og binder seriedata til den angitte tabellen.

trans-unit.source: Each column of the table becomes a Y-value for a series, with one series per column.
trans-unit.target: Hver kolonne i tabellen blir Y-verdien for en serie med én serie per kolonne.

trans-unit.source: The data source that is data bound by a chart, which can be any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden som databundet av et diagram som kan være noen <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>objektet.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Automatically creates and binds series data to the specified data table, and optionally populates X-values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter automatisk og binder seriedata til den angitte tabellen, og fyller ut eventuelt X-verdier.

trans-unit.source: Each column of the table becomes a Y-value for a series, with one series per column.
trans-unit.target: Hver kolonne i tabellen blir Y-verdien for en serie med én serie per kolonne.

trans-unit.source: The series' X-value field can also be provided.
trans-unit.target: Serien X-verdifeltet kan også angis.

trans-unit.source: The data source that is data bound by a chart, which can be any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden som databundet av et diagram som kan være noen <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>objektet.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The name of the field used for the series X-values.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet som brukes for serien X-verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator"></xref> object that provides methods and properties that handle data.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator"> </xref> -objekt med metoder og egenskaper som håndterer data.

trans-unit.source: Use this property at run-time to: - Copy Y-values.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen ved kjøretid til:-kopi Y-verdier.

trans-unit.source: - Filter data.
trans-unit.target: -Filtrere data.

trans-unit.source: - Group data.
trans-unit.target: -Data grupper.

trans-unit.source: - Replace missing data with empty points.
trans-unit.target: – Erstatt manglende data med tomt punkt.

trans-unit.source: - Export data to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: -Eksporter data til en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>objektet.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: - Sort data.
trans-unit.target: -Sortere data.

trans-unit.source: - Apply a financial formula to data.
trans-unit.target: -Bruke en økonomisk formel til data.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class overview for further details.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>Oversikt over klasse for flere detaljer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator"></xref> object that provides methods and properties that handle data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator"> </xref> -objekt med metoder og egenskaper som håndterer data.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir datakilden for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The data points in a series can be bound to a data source at any time using the DataSource property.
trans-unit.target: Datapunktene i en serie kan være bundet til en datakilde når som helst ved hjelp av DataSource-egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: To force the chart to bind to the data source, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil tvinge diagrammet skal bindes til datakilden, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.DataBind%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source: - DataView - Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - DataSet - DataTable - Binding Source - IDataSource - Arrays - Lists - All Enumerable objects - SqlCommand / OleDbCommand (DataSource data-binding only) - SqlDataAdapter / OleDbDataAdapter (DataSource data-binding only)
trans-unit.target: Følgende er en liste over objekter som kan brukes som datakilde: - DataView - Data for inndatatallsett (SQL, OleDB) - datasettet - DataTable - bindingen kilde - IDataSource - matriser - lister - et alle tallsett objekter - SqlCommand / OleDbCommand (DataSource-databinding bare) - SqlDataAdapter / Intern OleDbDataAdapter (DataSource-databinding bare)

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the data source for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer datakilden for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> objektet som representerer standardstørrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the chart element outline.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer diagrammet elementet rammeomrisset.

trans-unit.source: If the `chartElement` is not part of the chart, or the `elementType` cannot be combined with `chartElement`, the result will contain an empty array of marker points.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `chartElement` er ikke en del av diagrammet, eller `elementType` kan ikke kombineres med `chartElement`, resultatet inneholder en tom merke-punktmatrisen.

trans-unit.source: The marker points are sorted clockwise.
trans-unit.target: Merke punktene sorteres med klokken.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The type of the element.
trans-unit.target: Typen for elementet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementOutline"></xref> object that contains: - An array of points in absolute coordinates that can be used as outline markers around this chart element.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementOutline"> </xref> objekt som inneholder: – en punktmatrisen i absolutte koordinater som kan brukes som rammeomrisset indikatorer rundt dette diagramelementet.

trans-unit.source: - A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object for drawing an outline around this chart element.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> objekt for å tegne et rammeomrisset rundt dette diagramelementet.

trans-unit.target: Returnerer den forespurte diagrammet-tjenesten.

trans-unit.target: Tjenestetype forespurte diagrammet.

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer tjenestetypen eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis tjenesten ikke finnes.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before showing the tooltip to get the tooltip text.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før visning av verktøytips for å hente teksten for verktøytipset.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Determines the chart element, if any, that is located at a point defined by the given X and Y coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer diagramelementet Hvis som befinner seg på et punkt som er definert av den angitte X og Y koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine the chart element, if any, which is located at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden for å finne ut diagramelementet eventuelt som finnes på et angitt punkt.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object that is returned can then be used to determine which chart element was clicked; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object also provides an instance of the actual object selected, if any.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>objektet som er returnert kan deretter brukes til å finne ut hvilke diagramelement ble klikket; i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>-objektet har en forekomst av det faktiske objektet som er merket, også eventuelle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>

trans-unit.source: The X-coordinate value of the point the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for X-koordinat for punktet brukeren klikket.

trans-unit.source: The Y-coordinate value of the point the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for Y-koordinat for punktet brukeren klikket.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"></xref> object, which provides information concerning the chart element, if any, that is at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"> </xref> -objektet som gir informasjon om diagramelementet eventuell, som er i den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: Determines the chart element, if any, that is located at a point defined by given X and Y coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer diagramelementet som befinner seg på et punkt som er definert av gitt X og Y-koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Transparent elements can optionally be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Gjennomsiktig elementer kan eventuelt ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine the chart element, if any, which is located at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden for å finne ut diagramelementet eventuelt som finnes på et angitt punkt.

trans-unit.source: To ignore transparent elements, set the `ignoreTransparent` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ignorere gjennomsiktig elementer, kan du angi den `ignoreTransparent` parameter `true`.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object that is returned can then be used to determine which chart element was clicked; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object also provides an instance of the actual object selected, if any.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>objektet som er returnert kan deretter brukes til å finne ut hvilke diagramelement ble klikket; i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>-objektet har en forekomst av det faktiske objektet som er merket, også eventuelle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>

trans-unit.source: The X-coordinate value of the point the user clicked on.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for X-koordinat for punktet brukeren klikket.

trans-unit.source: The Y-coordinate value of the point the user clicked on.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for Y-koordinat for punktet brukeren klikket.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to ignore transparent elements; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>ignorerer gjennomsiktig elementer. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"></xref> object, which provides information concerning the chart element, if any, that is at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"> </xref> -objektet som gir informasjon om diagramelementet eventuell, som er i den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om et diagramelement for en gitt type er plassert i et punkt som er definert av gitt X og Y-koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine if a chart element of the given type is located at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden hvis du vil finne ut om et diagramelement for den angitte typen er plassert i et angitt punkt.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object that is returned can then be used to determine which chart element was clicked; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object also provides an instance of the actual object selected, if any.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>objektet som er returnert kan deretter brukes til å finne ut hvilke diagramelement ble klikket; i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>-objektet har en forekomst av det faktiske objektet som er merket, også eventuelle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>

trans-unit.source: The X-coordinate value of the point the user clicked on.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for X-koordinat for punktet brukeren klikket.

trans-unit.source: The Y-coordinate value of the point the user clicked on.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for Y-koordinat for punktet brukeren klikket.
