trans-unit.target: Et flagg som bestemmer diagramtypen elementet som skal testes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"></xref> object, which provides information concerning the chart element, if any, that is at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"> </xref> -objektet som gir informasjon om diagramelementet eventuell, som er i den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a chart element that is one of the specified types is located at a point defined by the given X and Y coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en diagramelementet er én av de angitte typene befinner seg i et punkt som er definert av den angitte X og Y koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine the gauge element, if any, which is located at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden hvis du vil finne målerelementet eventuelt som finnes på et angitt punkt.

trans-unit.source: This method is often used in some mouse-related event, for example, [M:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs](assetId:///M:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True), to determine which gauge element the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: This method is often used in some mouse-related event, for example, [M:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs](assetId:///M:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True), to determine which gauge element the end-user clicked.

trans-unit.source: The X and Y mouse coordinates obtained from the event parameters are then used for the X and Y parameter values of this method call.
trans-unit.target: X og Y musen koordinatene som er hentet fra hendelsen parameterne brukes deretter etter X og Y parameterverdiene av dette kallet.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the returned [HitTestResult](assetId:///T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True) object can then be used to determine which chart element was clicked; the [HitTestResult](assetId:///T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True) object also provides an instance of the actual object selected, if any.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for det returnerte [HitTestResult](assetId:///T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True) objekt kan deretter brukes til å finne ut hvilke diagramelement ble klikket; den [HitTestResult](assetId:///T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True) -objektet har en forekomst av det faktiske objektet som er merket, også eventuelle.

trans-unit.source: The X-coordinate for the specified data point.
trans-unit.target: X-koordinaten for det angitte datapunktet.

trans-unit.source: The Y-coordinate for the specified data point.
trans-unit.target: Y-koordinaten for det angitte datapunktet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to ignore transparent elements; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>ignorerer gjennomsiktig elementer. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType"></xref> objects that specify the types to test for, in order to filter the result.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType"> </xref> objekter som angir typen å teste, for å filtrere resultatet.

trans-unit.source: If omitted, checking for element types will be ignored and all element types will be valid.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den utelates, Søk etter elementtyper ignoreres, og alle elementtyper skal være gyldig.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"></xref> objects that provides information about the chart element, if any, found at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"> </xref> objekter som inneholder informasjon om diagramelementet Hvis eventuelle finnes på den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: The array contains at least one element, which can be <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen inneholder minst ett element, som kan være <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The objects in the result are sorted from the top to the bottom of different layers of control.
trans-unit.target: Objekter i resultatet sorteres fra toppen til bunnen av forskjellige lag i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection"></xref> object that stores <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage"></xref> objects for the chart.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection"> </xref> objekt som lagrer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage"> </xref> objekter for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> objects to and remove <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> objects from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection> object of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å legge til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage>objekter til og fjerne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage>objekter fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection>objekt av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage>

trans-unit.source: This collection property is available at run time only.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen-egenskapen er tilgjengelig på kjøretidspunktet bare.

trans-unit.source: An image—that is, an object derived from type <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, such as <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, that is created dynamically—can be stored in this collection, and then assigned at a later time to any image-related <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> property, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Et bilde, som er et objekt som er utledet fra typen <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, slik som <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, som opprettes dynamisk, kan lagres i denne samlingen, og deretter tilordnet senere relatert til bildet av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>egenskapen, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImage%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: When you assign a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> object to an image-related property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> class, use the name of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> object for the `string` value of the image-related property.
trans-unit.target: Når du tilordner en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage>objektet som et bilde-relaterte egenskap i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>klasse, bruker du navnet på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage>objekt den `string` verdien for egenskapen relatert til bildet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection"></xref> object that contains the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection"> </xref> objekt som inneholder samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the entire surface of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> and causes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldiggjøres hele overflaten på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> , og den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen skal tegnes på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldiggjøres det angitte området for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method adds the specified area to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control's update area, which is the area that will be repainted at the next paint operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden legger til det angitte området til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontrollens update-området som er området som tegnet på nytt ved neste paint-operasjon.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This method also causes a paint message to be sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden vil også en paint-melding sendes til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> object that specifies the area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> objekt som angir området som skal gjøre.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines if a smooth gradient is applied when shadows are drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som bestemmer om smidig gradering brukes når skygger tegnes.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `ShadowOffset` property for a series, data point, chart area or legend is nonzero, a shadow will be applied using a color set by their `ShadowColor` property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for den `ShadowOffset` -egenskapen for en serie, datapunkt, diagramområdet eller forklaring ikke er null, brukes skygge ved hjelp av en farge som er angitt av sin `ShadowColor` egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the IsSoftShadows property is `true`, a smooth gradient will be applied to the shadow.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for egenskapen IsSoftShadows `true`, smidig gradering vil bli brukt på skyggen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if shadows are drawn using smoothing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis skygger tegnes med utjevning; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCollection"></xref> that stores all <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> objects used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCollection"> </xref> som lagrer alle <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> objekter som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen egenskapen lagrer alle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>objekter som brukes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCollection"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> objects used by the chart.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCollection"> </xref> objekt som inneholder den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> objekter som brukes av diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: Loads a template into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control from an image stream.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn en mal til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen fra et bilde-dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you want to load a template from a stream, such as a memory stream, file stream, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden hvis du vil laste inn en mal fra en dataflyt, for eksempel en minne dataflyten filstrøm og så videre.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsTemplateMode%2A> property to `true` before saving the template with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsTemplateMode%2A>egenskapen `true` før du lagrer en mal med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Save%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Save%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.IsTemplateMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a loaded template has two data series, the appearance properties of the series are applied sequentially to the chart.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en laste inn malen har to serie, brukes egenskapene utseendet på serien sekvensielt diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: In other words, the first template series appearance properties are assigned to the first series of the chart, the second template series appearance properties are applied to the second series of the chart, then the first template series is used again for the third series of the chart, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, første malen serien utseendet egenskapene er tilordnet til den første serien med diagrammet, andre egenskaper for malen serien utseende brukes på den andre serien med diagrammet, og den første mal serien brukes på nytt for tredje serie i diagrammet og så videre.

trans-unit.source: The same holds true for chart areas, and any other collections that have appearance properties.
trans-unit.target: Det samme gjelder for diagramområder og andre samlinger som har utseende.

trans-unit.source: Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.
trans-unit.target: Maler som kan brukes til å simulere egendefinerte palettene.

trans-unit.source: The stream to load from.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten ikke laste inn fra.

trans-unit.source: Loads a template with the specified filename from the disk.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn en mal med det angitte filnavnet fra disken.

trans-unit.source: The file name of the template to load.
trans-unit.target: Filnavnet for malen som skal lastes inn.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the full path of the template to be loaded from the disk.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi hele banen til malen som skal lastes inn fra disken.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the palette for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir paletten for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A palette is used to automatically assign colors to data elements if both of the following conditions have been met: - the data points themselves do not have colors assigned to them.
trans-unit.target: En palett brukes til å knytte farger til dataelementer Hvis begge av følgende betingelser er oppfylt:-datapunktene seg har ikke fargene som er tilordnet.

trans-unit.source: - the data series that the data points belong to also does not have an assigned color.
trans-unit.target: -dataserien som datapunktene tilhører heller ikke har en tilordnet farge.

trans-unit.source: If no series or data point colors are explicitly specified, the colors used depend on the chart type and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object's palette or the palette of an associated series, if one is specified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen dataseriene eller punktfarger angis eksplisitt, fargene som brukes, avhengig av diagramtypen og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objektets palett eller paletten til den tilknyttede serien, hvis angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the `Palette` property for both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorPalette>, and no color is assigned to the relevant data series or data points, the data points will not be drawn, and will be displayed as "empty" areas.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den `Palette` -egenskapen for både den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>objekter er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorPalette>, og ingen farge er tilordnet til relevante dataseriene eller datapunkter, datapunktene ikke skal tegnes, og vises som "tomt" områder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorPalette> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorPalette"></xref> enumeration value that determines the palette to be used.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorPalette"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som bestemmer palett som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of custom palette colors.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en matrise av egendefinerte palettfarger.

trans-unit.source: If you need more than 16 colors or you want to apply your own colors to the chart, you must define a custom palette.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger mer enn 16 farger, eller du vil bruke din egen fargene i diagrammet, må du definere en egendefinert palett.

trans-unit.source: A custom palette let you add your own colors in the order you want them to appear on the chart.
trans-unit.target: En egendefinert palett kan du legge til dine egne farger i rekkefølgen som de skal vises i diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: This type of palette is especially helpful if the number of series in your chart is unknown at design time.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen palett er spesielt nyttig hvis antall serier i diagrammet er ukjent under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Palette%2A> property is *not* set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorPalette>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen effekt når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Palette%2A>egenskapen *ikke* satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorPalette>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorPalette> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Palette%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> objects that represent the set of colors used for series on the chart.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> objekter som representerer settet med fargene som brukes for serie i diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the chart element is painted.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når diagramelementet males.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the chart element background is painted.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når bakgrunnen for diagramelement males.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager"></xref> object used for printing a chart.
trans-unit.target: Henter en skrivebeskyttet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager"> </xref> objektet som ble brukt til å skrive ut et diagram.

trans-unit.source: When a chart is printed, all chart elements except scrollbars will be printed.
trans-unit.target: Når et diagram skrives, skrives alle diagramelementer unntatt scrollbars.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager> object contains the following methods, which are used for basic printing operations: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager.PageSetup%2A>: Displays a Page Setup dialog, which allows the end-user to select paper size, paper source, page orientation, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager>objektet inneholder følgende metoder, som brukes til grunnleggende utskrift operasjoner: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager.PageSetup%2A>: Viser en dialogboks i Utskriftsformat, som tillater at sluttbrukeren skal kunne velge størrelse, kilde, retning og så videre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager.PageSetup%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager.PrintPreview%2A>: Displays a Print Preview dialog, which allows the end-user to zoom, print the chart, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager.PrintPreview%2A>: Viser en dialogboks i forhåndsvisning, som tillater at sluttbrukeren zoom, skrive ut diagrammet og så videre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager.PrintPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager.Print%2A>: Prints the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>; the Print dialog can optionally be displayed prior to printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager.Print%2A>: Skriver den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>; utskriften kan eventuelt vises før utskrift.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager.Print%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager"></xref> object used for printing a chart.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PrintingManager"> </xref> objektet som ble brukt til å skrive ut et diagram.

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger kontrollen for å gjøre det klientområdet og tegne umiddelbart selve og alle underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the horizontal resolution of the chart renderer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som Representer vannrett oppløsning på gjengiveren diagram.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical resolution of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> renderer.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den loddrette løsing av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> gjengiveren.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the vertical resolution of the chart renderer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som Representer loddrett oppløsning på gjengiveren diagram.

trans-unit.source: Resets automatically calculated chart property values to "Auto".
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller beregnes automatisk diagrammet egenskapsverdier "Auto".

trans-unit.source: Several chart properties can be set to "Auto"—for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Minimum%2A>; these properties are calculated prior to the chart being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Flere Diagramegenskaper kan angis til "Auto", for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Minimum%2A>; disse egenskapene beregnes før diagrammet gjengitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: "Auto" is usually represented as a <xref:System.Double.NaN> value.
trans-unit.target: "Auto" vanligvis er representert som en <xref:System.Double.NaN>verdi.</xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: Call this method to reset these properties from their calculated value to "Auto" (<xref:System.Double.NaN>).
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden hvis du vil tilbakestille disse egenskapene fra den beregnede verdien "Auto" (<xref:System.Double.NaN>).</xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer"></xref> object that is used for chart serialization.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer"> </xref> objekt som brukes for diagrammet serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Use this property at either design time or run time to serialize the chart.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen enten utformingen eller kjøretid til å serialisere diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer> class, refer to the class overview.
trans-unit.target: For en detaljert beskrivelse av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer>klasse, kan du se Oversikt over klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer"></xref> object that is used for chart serialization.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer"> </xref> objekt som brukes for diagrammet serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection"></xref> object, which contains <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection"> </xref> -objektet som inneholder <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: This collection property allows you to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection> class, which stores <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects and also provides methods and properties used to manipulate this collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen egenskapen får du tilgang til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection>klasse som butikker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>objekter og gir deg også metoder og egenskaper som brukes til å redigere denne samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects store <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> objects, as well as data attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>objekter store <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>objekter, i tillegg til data-attributter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection"></xref> object which contains <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection"> </xref> objekt som inneholder <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> object that represents the size of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> objektet som representerer størrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether non-critical exceptions should be suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som bestemmer om skal ikke-kritiske unntak undertrykkes.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, non-critical exceptions will be suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne egenskapen til `true`, ikke-kritiske unntak undertrykkes.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control cannot properly plot the chart using the data and other settings provided, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontrollen riktig kan ikke tegnes diagrammet ved hjelp av dataene og andre innstillinger som er angitt, vil bli utløst et unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: Although displaying exceptions is useful during application testing, they should not be shown when the application is released.
trans-unit.target: Selv om vises unntak nyttig under testing av programmer, skal de vises ikke når programmet frigis.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property to `true` may hide serious issues in the user application source code.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når egenskapen settes `true` kan skjule alvorlige problemer i brukerkode for programmet kilde.

trans-unit.source: This setting could also cause a chart image to be generated that might misrepresent your data.
trans-unit.target: Denne innstillingen kan også føre til at en diagrambildet genereres som kan fremstille dataene dine.

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended that this mode be only used in Release builds.
trans-unit.target: Det anbefales at denne modusen være bare brukes i utgaven bygger.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if non-critical exceptions should be suppressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis ikke-kritiske unntak skal undertrykkes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAntiAliasingQuality"></xref> type to use when applying anti-aliasing to text.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAntiAliasingQuality"> </xref> som brukes når de bruker anti-aliasing til tekst.

trans-unit.source: If the anti-aliasing is applied to text, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control will use this property to determine the type of textual anti-aliasing to apply.
trans-unit.target: Hvis anti-aliasing brukes til tekst i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontrollen bruker denne egenskapen for å finne ut hva slags tekstbaserte anti-aliasing skal brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAntiAliasingQuality"></xref> enumeration value used to apply anti-aliasing to text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAntiAliasingQuality"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som brukes til å bruke utjevning til tekst.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAntiAliasingQuality"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAntiAliasingQuality"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TitleCollection"></xref> object that is used to store all <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Title"></xref> objects used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TitleCollection"> </xref> objekt som brukes til å lagre alle <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Title"> </xref> objekter som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Titles property stores all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Title> objects used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen titlene lagrer alle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Title>objekter som brukes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Title>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TitleCollection"></xref> object that is used to store all <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Title"></xref> objects used by the chart control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TitleCollection"> </xref> objekt som brukes til å lagre alle <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Title"> </xref> objekter som brukes av diagramkontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Updates the annotations in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer merknader i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Updates the cursor in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer markøren i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.
